intro: Immerse yourself in 40 years of video game history and experience the classic BOULDER DASH® in an epic anniversary edition!
description:
A legend returns! Join Rockford on his hunt for diamonds in dangerous caves – more faithful to the original than ever before, yet more modern than ever!

Celebrate 40 years of retro action with a game that made history!

Since its initial release in 1984, BOULDER DASH® has thrilled generations of players. Now, the iconic title returns with a completely new, faithful game engine. A treat for long-time fans and newcomers alike. Your task: Collect enough diamonds in a cave filled with treacherous enemies and falling rocks to open the door to the exit. Here, you not only have to be skillful and quick to react, but also develop a suitable strategy more than once in order to survive. And once you've completed all 180 levels, you can use an editor to not only design new levels, but also download and play content from the worldwide Boulder Dash community for free. Never before has BOULDER DASH® looked better or sounded more spectacular!

Highlights of the 40th Anniversary Edition:
• 60 classic levels from BOULDER DASH® I, II & III – remastered!
• 180 brand new levels full of excitement, strategy, and diamond fever!
• 6 completely new worlds and 3 exclusive fan worlds from real Boulder Dash legends
• New game elements: Vertically growing walls, acid eating rocks and diamonds, enemy generators, surprise eggs and much!
• Level editor & community content: Build your own caves or play countless creations from other players
• Choose your hero: Play with one of three unique characters – inspired by the original design
• Powerful sound: Accompanied by an epic soundtrack from Germany's most famous video game composer, Chris Huelsbeck 
• Experience the ultimate BOULDER DASH® – for retro fans, puzzle pros, and newcomers alike.
Time travel doesn't exist? Yes, it does! With BOULDER DASH® 40th Anniversary, you can travel back to the golden age of video games – and bring the best of it into the present. Be there when Rockford makes history again!

Download now and relive the legend!
